displayProperties.description:
• Earn Alloys by completing Solstice Forge bounties. Use these Alloys to forge Sublime armor.

• Earn Silver Leaves from completing activities throughout the game with your Solstice Forge. Use your Silver Leaves to refresh the selection of Solstice Forge bounties offered to find your ideal synergies of objectives.

• Complete Event Challenges, located on the Quest screen, to acquire Event Tickets, which can be used to acquire rewards from the Event Card.

• Glows can be acquired for Sublime armor after you've forged the associated armor type within the Solstice Forge and earned enough currency to acquire the Incandescence quest.

• Sublime armor with higher stats can be acquired by completing Solstice Forge bounties after you've forged that armor once.

• Solstice 2024 weapons with additional perks can be acquired by completing Solstice Forge bounties after you've forged an entire set of armor for your current class.

displayProperties.description:
• Earn Spectral Pages by completing activities throughout the system with a mask equipped. Launch into the Haunted Sector playlist and defeat Headless Ones to transform Spectral Pages into Manifested Pages. The more Headless Ones that are defeated, the more Spectral Pages can be transformed into Manifested Pages, and the more Festival of the Lost weapons and Candy can be rewarded.

• Manifested Pages can be redeemed at the Book of the Forgotten, located in the Tower, to unlock legends, stories, and tales of the Tower.

• Earn Eerie Engrams by completing Haunted Sectors or higher difficulty Haunted Sectors. Eerie Engrams can be decoded as is, or focused into Eerie Exotic Engrams with Eva.

•Earn Candy by defeating combatants and completing activities throughout the system with a mask equipped. Candy can be used to purchase Mystery Grab Bags from Eva, which may contain Masterwork materials. Candy can also be used to purchase masks from Eva.

• Complete Event Challenges, located on the Quest screen, to acquire cool event rewards!

displayProperties.description:
• Earn Medallions from completing Contender or Platinum Cards (acquired from Eva), or ritual activities with your class item equipped. Medallions can be banked at the podium in the Tower for event rewards, and they will contribute toward your class standing!

• Achieving high scores in the "Vying for Supremacy" or "Shoot to Score" quests will allow you to light torches and unlock Tower chests. Tower chests contain event gear, buffs, and glows. Tower chest rewards reset weekly.

• Players in the Tower with the highest score in Guardian Games Ops and Supremacy receive the Best in Tower Glow for each respective activity.

• Compete in the Focus Activity to earn even more Medallions. Completions of the Focus Activity contribute points to your class's total score, which will unlock increased Medallion rewards and ritual reputation. The class that achieves the highest total cumulative score during each instance of the Focus Activity earns a Winner's Package full of Medallions.

• Acquire Diamond Contender Cards from Eva in order to earn incredibly lucrative Diamond Medallions!
displayProperties.name: Event Information

displayProperties.description:
A master of Void Light, the Voidwalker empowers their own health and ability regeneration, while dealing massive damage to groups of targets.

This build is focused on defeating targets to gain health and ability energy.
displayProperties.name: Voidwalker

tooltipNotifications.displayString: Choosing a New Light Kit will change your currently equipped items and subclass.

displayProperties.description:
A master of conflagration, the Dawnblade uses Solar Light to soar through the skies, spreading flames across the battlefield. They focus on igniting their targets, leaving only ashes in their wake.

This build is focused on setting fire to targets until they explode.
displayProperties.name: Dawnblade

tooltipNotifications.displayString: Choosing a New Light Kit will change your currently equipped items and subclass.

displayProperties.description:
The embodiment of the tempest itself, the Stormcaller uses Arc Light to cast lightning down upon their targets. They amplify their own damage while smiting targets with powerful bursts of energy.

This build is focused on amplifying Arc weapon damage and ability regeneration.
displayProperties.name: Stormcaller

tooltipNotifications.displayString: Choosing a New Light Kit will change your currently equipped items and subclass.

displayProperties.description:
A master of melee attacks, the Striker embodies the power of lightning itself. They use incredible speed to get up close and personal with targets, before delivering devastating strikes.

This build is focused on closing distance with targets and delivering high-impact damage.
displayProperties.name: Striker

tooltipNotifications.displayString: Choosing a New Light Kit will change your currently equipped items and subclass.

displayProperties.description:
A master of fire, the Sunbreaker uses Solar Light to spread incinerating flames across the battlefield. They use grenades and throwing hammers to create Sunspots, which empower their allies and melt their targets.

This build is focused on using Sunspots to heal yourself and damage your targets.
displayProperties.name: Sunbreaker

tooltipNotifications.displayString: Choosing a New Light Kit will change your currently equipped items and subclass.

displayProperties.description:
A bastion of defense, the Sentinel uses their Void Light to create protective barriers. They are unmovable bulwarks, conjuring overshields to protect against even the strongest of attacks.

This build is focused on using defensive abilities to shield yourself and your allies.
displayProperties.name: Sentinel

tooltipNotifications.displayString: Choosing a New Light Kit will change your currently equipped items and subclass.

displayProperties.description:
A master of weaponry, the Gunslinger uses their arsenal of Solar-infused guns, blades, and explosives to deal devastating damage to their targets.

This build is focused on abilities that cause explosive chain reactions.
displayProperties.name: Gunslinger

tooltipNotifications.displayString: Choosing a New Light Kit will change your currently equipped items and subclass.

displayProperties.description:
A master of acrobatics, the Arcstrider uses agility to strike in quick succession, disorienting targets and landing devastating melee attacks.

This build is focused on weaving abilities together in powerful combinations.
displayProperties.name: Arcstrider

tooltipNotifications.displayString: Choosing a New Light Kit will change your currently equipped items and subclass.

displayProperties.description:
A master of stealth, the Nightstalker uses Void Light to conceal themselves and ambush their targets. Their mastery of traps and snares allows them to control the battlefield from the shadows.

This build is focused on using invisibility to ambush targets.
displayProperties.name: Nightstalker

tooltipNotifications.displayString: Choosing a New Light Kit will change your currently equipped items and subclass.
